name: DateRangePickerDialog
desc: A Material-style date range picker dialog.

fields.name: initialDateRange
fields.desc: The date range that the date range picker starts with when it opens.

fields.name: firstDate
fields.desc: The earliest allowable date on the date range.

fields.name: lastDate
fields.desc: The latest allowable date on the date range.

fields.name: currentDate
fields.desc: The [currentDate] represents the current day (i.e. today).

fields.name: initialEntryMode
fields.desc: The initial date range picker entry mode.

fields.name: cancelText
fields.desc: The label on the cancel button for the text input mode.

fields.name: confirmText
fields.desc: The label on the "OK" button for the text input mode.

fields.name: saveText
fields.desc: The label on the save button for the fullscreen calendar mode.

fields.name: helpText
fields.desc: The label displayed at the top of the dialog.

fields.name: errorInvalidRangeText
fields.desc: The message used when the date range is invalid (e.g. start date is after end date).

fields.name: errorFormatText
fields.desc: The message used when an input text isn't in a proper date format.

fields.name: errorInvalidText
fields.desc: The message used when an input text isn't a selectable date.

fields.name: fieldStartHintText
fields.desc: The text used to prompt the user when no text has been entered in the start field.

fields.name: fieldEndHintText
fields.desc: The text used to prompt the user when no text has been entered in the end field.

fields.name: fieldStartLabelText
fields.desc: The label for the start date text input field.

fields.name: fieldEndLabelText
fields.desc: The label for the end date text input field.

fields.name: keyboardType
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.datePickerDialog}

fields.name: restorationId
fields.desc: Restoration ID to save and restore the state of the [DateRangePickerDialog].

fields.name: switchToInputEntryModeIcon
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.date_picker.switchToInputEntryModeIcon}

fields.name: switchToCalendarEntryModeIcon
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.date_picker.switchToCalendarEntryModeIcon}

fields.name: selectableDayPredicate
fields.desc: Function to provide full control over which [DateTime] can be selected.

fields.name: calendarDelegate
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.calendar_date_picker.calendarDelegate}

nodes.name: Customize DateRangePickerDialog
desc: Modify the source code of DateRangePickerDialog to display a numerical background for month entries.
